There's a fan-made patch for this game at auritech.eu that balances the mechanics out and increase difficulty; you can use CDMage to replace SCUS_942.21 with the patched version in their download section (import the patched file over the old one and it will work even though the timestamp doesn't change).

You can also replace SCEAP.DAT with the attachment in http://auritech.fantopolis.com/viewtopic.php?t=281 for an indication right at boot that the ISO was patched.
